We are happy to announce that Quarto 1.3 has been released. You can grab the new version from <https://quarto.org/docs/download/>.

If you are ever wondering which version of Quarto you are using, a quick way to check on the command line is:

```{.bash filename="Terminal"}
quarto --version
```

We've previously blogged about some of the features of this release that we were most excited about:

::: {#highlight-listing}
:::

You can read about some of the other highlights on the [pre-release page](/docs/prerelease/1.3/), as well as all the other changes in 1.3, in the [Release Notes](/docs/download/#release-notes-2).
